com.amazon.clouddrive.configuration

Class ClientConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazon.clouddrive.configuration.ClientConfiguration

  • public class ClientConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines configuration options for making requests to Amazon Cloud Drive. ClientConfiguration is not specific to an account and may be used again if the customer signs out. The ClientConfiguration requires a user agent string so that the client instance can be identified by Amazon Cloud Drive. A MetricListener can be set on the ClientConfiguration instance in order to observe metrics from the client.
